channel.title: Getting the Xbox-One worth it?
channel.description: I really want to get the Master Chief Collection, but it's only for Xbox-One. Is it worth blowing all that money? What do you guys think?

item.title: Getting the Xbox-One worth it?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

thats why i bought the xbox one too, for halo, p worth it

Read full topic

item.title: Getting the Xbox-One worth it?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“stCky, post:5, topic:551005”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=669921.msg4479526#msg4479526 date=1428645043]
How many do I play?
1, maybe 2 a month.
[/quote]

Me too - did you get your xbox for one game though?

My point was I got the console for gta v - now I use it for more albeit barely.[/quote]
I actually can’t remember why I bought it.
I think at the time it was just to get “the next big console”. And the Halo series. I’ve played it since Halo 1 on the original xbox. But I didn’t relate halo 3 to the 360. Nor do I think I even knew it was going to be made…

Read full topic

item.title: Getting the Xbox-One worth it?
item.dc:creator: @ayeitswill ayeitswill
item.description:
@ayeitswill wrote:

Super worth it. It is a good gaming system and the graphics are pretty sweet.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting the Xbox-One worth it?
item.dc:creator: @stCky stCky
item.description:
@stCky wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:551005”]How many do I play?
1, maybe 2 a month.[/quote]

Me too - did you get your xbox for one game though?

My point was I got the console for gta v - now I use it for more albeit barely.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting the Xbox-One worth it?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“stCky, post:3, topic:551005”]I’m sure if you bought the console for one game/collection you’d end up using it for more - media centre, browsing and you’ll probably start playing other games on it too. Maybe the GF wants to get Viva Pinata or some bullshit I don’t know.

I was given an xbox 360, it was renamed “the gta v machine” as for a long time that’s all it was and all I intended for it, alas I now have 10+ games for it.[/quote]
You’d think that…

But my xbox 360, which I own like 50+ games (totally unsure on the count since i have a bunch downloaded and a bunch not downloaded that I own).
How many do I play?
1, maybe 2 a month.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting the Xbox-One worth it?
item.dc:creator: @stCky stCky
item.description:
@stCky wrote:

I’m sure if you bought the console for one game/collection you’d end up using it for more - media centre, browsing and you’ll probably start playing other games on it too. Maybe the GF wants to get Viva Pinata or some bullshit I don’t know.

I was given an xbox 360, it was renamed “the gta v machine” as for a long time that’s all it was and all I intended for it, alas I now have 10+ games for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting the Xbox-One worth it?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I want it for the mater chief collection, but that’s all.

To me, that doesn’t justify the $400+ purchase for the console and games.

Read full topic
